trans-unit.source: The start for gidNumbers, this number is added to a number generated from the group.Pk to make sure that the numbers aren't too low for POSIX groups. Default is 4000 to ensure that we don't collide with local groups or users primary groups gidNumber

trans-unit.source: Use this provider with nginx's auth_request or traefik's forwardAuth. Each application/domain needs its own provider. Additionally, on each domain, /outpost.goauthentik.io must be routed to the outpost (when using a manged outpost, this is done for you).

trans-unit.source: Use this provider with nginx's auth_request or traefik's forwardAuth. Only a single provider is required per root domain. You can't do per-application authorization, but you don't have to create a provider for each application.

trans-unit.source: If the password's score is less than or equal this value, the policy will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码分数小于等于此值，则策略失败。
0：过于易猜测：密码有风险。（猜测次数 < 10^3）

trans-unit.source: 1: Very guessable: protection from throttled online attacks. (guesses < 10^6)
trans-unit.target: 1：非常易猜测：可以防范受限的在线攻击。（猜测次数 < 10^6）

trans-unit.source: 2: Somewhat guessable: protection from unthrottled online attacks. (guesses < 10^8)
trans-unit.target: 2：有些易猜测：可以防范不受限的在线攻击。（猜测次数 < 10^8）

trans-unit.source: 3: Safely unguessable: moderate protection from offline slow-hash scenario. (guesses < 10^10)
trans-unit.target: 3：难以猜测：适度防范离线慢速哈希场景。（猜测次数 < 10^10）

trans-unit.source: 4: Very unguessable: strong protection from offline slow-hash scenario. (guesses >= 10^10)
trans-unit.target: 4：非常难以猜测：高度防范离线慢速哈希场景。（猜测次数 >= 10^10）

trans-unit.source: Checks the value from the policy request against several rules, mostly used to ensure password strength.

trans-unit.source: Optionally provide a short hint that describes the expected input value. When creating a fixed choice field, enable interpreting as expression and return a list to return multiple choices.

trans-unit.source: Restarts the flow from the beginning

trans-unit.source: Stage used to configure a duo-based authenticator. This stage should be used for configuration flows.

trans-unit.source: Flow used by an authenticated user to configure this Stage. If empty, user will not be able to configure this stage.
trans-unit.target: 经过身份验证的用户用来配置此阶段的流程。如果为空，用户将无法配置此阶段。

trans-unit.source: This is the full endpoint to send POST requests to.

trans-unit.source: This is the username to be used with basic auth or the token when used with bearer token

trans-unit.target: 这是用于 Basic 身份验证的密码

trans-unit.source: Modify the payload sent to the custom provider.

trans-unit.source: Number the SMS will be sent from.

If enabled, only a hash of the phone number will be saved. This can be done for data-protection reasons. Devices created from a stage with this enabled cannot be used with the authenticator validation stage.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，仅保存电话号码的哈希。这是出于数据保护的原因。如果设备创建自启用此选项的阶段，则无法在验证阶段使用身份验证器。

trans-unit.source: Stage used to configure a static authenticator (i.e. static tokens). This stage should be used for configuration flows.
trans-unit.target: 用来配置静态身份验证器（即静态令牌）的阶段。此阶段应该用于配置流程。

trans-unit.source: Stage used to configure a TOTP authenticator (i.e. Authy/Google Authenticator).

trans-unit.source: 8 digits, not compatible with apps like Google Authenticator
trans-unit.target: 8 位数字，与 Google 身份验证器等应用不兼容

trans-unit.source: Stage used to validate any authenticator. This stage should be used during authentication or authorization flows.
trans-unit.target: 用来验证任何身份验证器的阶段。此阶段应在身份验证或授权流程中使用。
基于短信的身份验证器

trans-unit.source: Device classes which can be used to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: 可用于进行身份验证的设备类型。

trans-unit.target: 如果上面所选类型的任意设备在此期限内被使用，此阶段会被跳过。

trans-unit.source: Force the user to configure an authenticator
trans-unit.target: 强制用户配置身份验证器

trans-unit.source: User verification is preferred if available, but not required.

trans-unit.source: Stages used to configure Authenticator when user doesn't have any compatible devices. After this configuration Stage passes, the user is not prompted again.
trans-unit.target: 当用户没有任何兼容的设备时，用来配置身份验证器的阶段。此阶段通过后，将不再请求此用户。

trans-unit.source: When multiple stages are selected, the user can choose which one they want to enroll.
trans-unit.target: 选中多个阶段时，用户可以选择要注册哪个。

trans-unit.source: Stage used to configure a WebAutnn authenticator (i.e. Yubikey, FaceID/Windows Hello).
trans-unit.target: 用来配置 WebAuthn 身份验证器（即 Yubikey、FaceID/Windows Hello）的阶段。

trans-unit.source: The authenticator should not create a dedicated credential
trans-unit.target: 身份验证器不应该创建专用凭据

trans-unit.target: 身份验证器可以创建和存储专用凭据，但不创建也可以

trans-unit.target: 身份验证器必须创建专用凭据。如果不能，RP 预期会发生错误

trans-unit.source: A non-removable authenticator, like TouchID or Windows Hello
trans-unit.target: 不可移除的身份验证器，例如 TouchID 或 Windows Hello
像 YubiKey 这样的“漫游”身份验证器

trans-unit.source: This stage checks the user's current session against the Google reCaptcha (or compatible) service.
trans-unit.target: 此阶段会根据 Google reCaptcha（或兼容的）服务检查用户的当前会话。

trans-unit.source: URL to fetch JavaScript from, defaults to recaptcha. Can be replaced with any compatible alternative.
trans-unit.target: 拉取 JavaScript 的 URL，默认为 recaptcha。可以替换为任何兼容替代。

trans-unit.source: URL used to validate captcha response, defaults to recaptcha. Can be replaced with any compatible alternative.
trans-unit.target: 用于校验验证码响应的 URL，默认为 recaptcha。可以替换为任何兼容替代。

trans-unit.source: Prompt for the user's consent. The consent can either be permanent or expire in a defined amount of time.
trans-unit.target: 请求用户同意授权。同意授权可以是永久性的，也可以在规定的时间后过期。
始终需要征得同意授权

trans-unit.source: Statically deny the flow. To use this stage effectively, disable *Evaluate on plan* on the respective binding.
trans-unit.target: 静态拒绝流。要有效地使用此阶段，请在相应的绑定上禁用*规划时进行评估*。

trans-unit.source: Dummy stage used for testing. Shows a simple continue button and always passes.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试的虚拟阶段。显示一个简单的“继续”按钮，并且始终通过。

trans-unit.source: Verify the user's email address by sending them a one-time-link. Can also be used for recovery to verify the user's authenticity.
trans-unit.target: 通过向用户发送一次性链接来验证用户的电子邮件地址。也可用于在恢复时验证用户的真实性。
成功时激活待处理用户

trans-unit.source: When a user returns from the email successfully, their account will be activated.
trans-unit.target: 当用户成功自电子邮件中返回时，其账户将被激活。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, global Email connection settings will be used and connection settings below will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，将使用全局电子邮件连接设置，下面的连接设置将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Time in minutes the token sent is valid.
trans-unit.target: 发出令牌的有效时间（单位为分钟）。

trans-unit.source: Let the user identify themselves with their username or Email address.
trans-unit.target: 让用户使用用户名或电子邮件地址来标识自己。

trans-unit.source: Fields a user can identify themselves with. If no fields are selected, the user will only be able to use sources.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以用来标识自己的字段。如果未选择任何字段，则用户将只能使用源。

trans-unit.source: When selected, a password field is shown on the same page instead of a separate page. This prevents username enumeration attacks.
trans-unit.target: 选中后，密码字段将显示在同一页面，而不是单独的页面上。这样可以防止用户名枚举攻击。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, user fields are matched regardless of their casing.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，无论大小写如何，都将匹配用户字段。

trans-unit.source: When a valid username/email has been entered, and this option is enabled, the user's username and avatar will be shown. Otherwise, the text that the user entered will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入了有效的用户名/电子邮箱，并且启用了此选项，则会显示用户的用户名和头像。否则，将显示用户输入的文本。

trans-unit.source: Select sources should be shown for users to authenticate with. This only affects web-based sources, not LDAP.
trans-unit.target: 选择的源应显示给用户进行身份验证。这只会影响基于 Web 的源，而不影响 LDAP。

trans-unit.source: By default, only icons are shown for sources. Enable this to show their full names.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，只为源显示图标。启用此选项可显示它们的全名。

trans-unit.source: Optional passwordless flow, which is linked at the bottom of the page. When configured, users can use this flow to authenticate with a WebAuthn authenticator, without entering any details.
trans-unit.target: 可选的无密码流程，链接在页面底部。配置后，用户可以使用此流程通过 WebAuthn 身份验证器进行验证，无需输入任何详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Optional enrollment flow, which is linked at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: 可选注册流程，链接在页面底部。

trans-unit.source: Optional recovery flow, which is linked at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: 可选的恢复流程，链接在页面底部。

trans-unit.source: This stage can be included in enrollment flows to accept invitations.
trans-unit.target: 此阶段可以包含在注册流程中以接受邀请。
在没有邀请的情况下继续流程

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set, this Stage will jump to the next Stage when no Invitation is given. By default this Stage will cancel the Flow when no invitation is given.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此标志，则当没有发出邀请时，此阶段将跳转到下一个阶段。默认情况下，当没有发出邀请时，此阶段将取消流程。

trans-unit.source: Validate the user's password against the selected backend(s).
trans-unit.target: 根据选定的后端验证用户的密码。
用户数据库 + 标准密码
用户数据库 + 应用程序密码
用户数据库 + LDAP 密码

trans-unit.source: Selection of backends to test the password against.
trans-unit.target: 选择用于测试密码的后端。

trans-unit.source: Flow used by an authenticated user to configure their password. If empty, user will not be able to configure change their password.
trans-unit.target: 经过身份验证的用户用来配置其密码的流程。如果为空，用户将无法配置更改其密码。

trans-unit.source: How many attempts a user has before the flow is canceled. To lock the user out, use a reputation policy and a user_write stage.
trans-unit.target: 在取消流程之前，用户可以尝试多少次。要锁定用户，请使用信誉策略和 user_write 阶段。

trans-unit.source: Show arbitrary input fields to the user, for example during enrollment. Data is saved in the flow context under the 'prompt_data' variable.
trans-unit.target: 向用户显示任意输入字段，例如在注册期间。数据保存在流程上下文中的 'prompt_data' 变量下。

trans-unit.source: Selected policies are executed when the stage is submitted to validate the data.
trans-unit.target: 当阶段被提交以验证数据时，执行选定的策略。

trans-unit.source: Delete the currently pending user. CAUTION, this stage does not ask for confirmation. Use a consent stage to ensure the user is aware of their actions.
trans-unit.target: 删除当前待处理的用户。注意，这个阶段不要求确认。使用同意授权阶段来确保用户知道自己的行为。

trans-unit.source: Log the currently pending user in.
trans-unit.target: 登录当前待处理的用户。

trans-unit.source: Determines how long a session lasts. Default of 0 seconds means that the sessions lasts until the browser is closed.
trans-unit.target: 确定会话持续多长时间。默认为 0 秒意味着会话持续到浏览器关闭为止。

trans-unit.source: Different browsers handle session cookies differently, and might not remove them even when the browser is closed.
trans-unit.target: 不同浏览器处理会话 Cookie 的方式不同，即使关闭浏览器，也不能保证它们会被删除。

trans-unit.source: If set to a duration above 0, the user will have the option to choose to "stay signed in", which will extend their session by the time specified here.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置时长大于 0，用户可以选择“保持登录”选项，这将使用户的会话延长此处设置的时间。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, all previous sessions of the user will be terminated.
trans-unit.target: 启用时，此用户的所有过往会话将会被终止。

trans-unit.source: Remove the user from the current session.
trans-unit.target: 从当前会话中移除用户。

trans-unit.source: Write any data from the flow's context's 'prompt_data' to the currently pending user. If no user is pending, a new user is created, and data is written to them.
trans-unit.target: 将流程上下文的 'prompt_data' 中的任何数据写入当前待处理的用户。 如果没有用户处于待处理状态，则会创建新用户并向其写入数据。

trans-unit.source: When no user is present in the flow context, the stage will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果流程上下文中没有出现用户，此阶段失败。

trans-unit.source: When no user is present in the the flow context, a new user is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果流程上下文中没有出现用户，则创建新用户。

trans-unit.source: Create a new user even if a user is in the flow context.
trans-unit.target: 即使用户在流程上下文中，仍然创建新用户。

trans-unit.source: Mark newly created users as inactive.
trans-unit.target: 将新创建的用户标记为未激活。

trans-unit.source: Path new users will be created under. If left blank, the default path will be used.
trans-unit.target: 新用户将会在此路径下创建。如果留空，则使用默认路径。

trans-unit.source: Newly created users are added to this group, if a group is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择了组，则会将新创建的用户添加到该组。

trans-unit.source: The user in authentik this device will be assigned to.
trans-unit.target: 此设备要绑定的 authentik 用户。

trans-unit.source: The user ID in Duo, can be found in the URL after clicking on a user.
trans-unit.target: Duo 中的用户 ID，可以点击用户之后，在 URL 中找到。
已成功导入 个设备。

trans-unit.source: Stages are single steps of a Flow that a user is guided through. A stage can only be executed from within a flow.
trans-unit.target: 阶段是引导用户完成流程的单个步骤。阶段只能在流程内部执行。

trans-unit.source: Shown as the Title in Flow pages.
trans-unit.target: 显示为流程页面中的标题。

trans-unit.source: Decides what this Flow is used for. For example, the Authentication flow is redirect to when an un-authenticated user visits authentik.
trans-unit.target: 决定此流程的用途。例如，当未经身份验证的用户访问 authentik 时，会重定向到身份验证流程。

trans-unit.source: Required authentication level for this flow.
trans-unit.target: 此流程需要身份验证等级。

trans-unit.source: Increases compatibility with password managers and mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: 增强与移动设备与密码管理器的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Will follow the ?next parameter if set, otherwise show a message
trans-unit.target: 将会首先遵循 ?next 参数，如果不存在则显示一条消息

trans-unit.source: Will either follow the ?next parameter or redirect to the default interface
trans-unit.target: 将会遵循 ?next 参数或者重定向到默认接口

trans-unit.source: Will notify the user the flow isn't applicable
trans-unit.target: 将会通知用户此流程不适用

trans-unit.source: Decides the response when a policy denies access to this flow for a user.
trans-unit.target: 当一条策略拒绝用户访问此流程时决定响应。
执行过程中显示的背景。
删除当前设置的背景图片。

trans-unit.source: .yaml files, which can be found on goauthentik.io and can be exported by authentik.
trans-unit.target: .yaml 文件，可以在 goauthentik.io 上找到，也可以通过 authentik 导出。

trans-unit.source: Flows describe a chain of Stages to authenticate, enroll or recover a user. Stages are chosen based on policies applied to them.
trans-unit.target: 流程描述了一系列用于对用户进行身份验证、注册或恢复的阶段。阶段是根据应用于它们的策略来选择的。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to clear the flow cache? This will cause all flows to be re-evaluated on their next usage.
trans-unit.target: 确实要清除流程缓存吗？ 这将导致所有流程在下次使用时重新评估。

trans-unit.source: These bindings control if this stage will be applied to the flow.
trans-unit.target: 这些绑定控制是否将此阶段应用于流程。

trans-unit.source: No stages are currently bound to this flow.
trans-unit.target: 目前没有阶段绑定到此流程。

trans-unit.source: These bindings control which users can access this flow.
trans-unit.target: 这些绑定控制哪些用户可以访问此流程。

trans-unit.source: Local (notifications will be created within authentik)
trans-unit.target: 本地（通知在 authentik 内创建）

trans-unit.source: Only send notification once, for example when sending a webhook into a chat channel.
trans-unit.target: 仅发送一次通知，例如在向聊天频道发送 Webhook 时。

trans-unit.source: Define how notifications are sent to users, like Email or Webhook.
trans-unit.target: 定义如何向用户发送通知，例如电子邮件或 Webhook。

trans-unit.source: Select the group of users which the alerts are sent to. If no group is selected the rule is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 选择一组用于发送警告的用户。如果未选择组，则此规则被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Select which transports should be used to notify the user. If none are selected, the notification will only be shown in the authentik UI.
trans-unit.target: 选择应使用哪些传输方式来通知用户。如果未选择任何内容，则通知将仅显示在 authentik UI 中。

trans-unit.source: Send notifications whenever a specific Event is created and matched by policies.
trans-unit.target: 每当特定事件被创建并匹配策略时，都会发送通知。

trans-unit.source: These bindings control upon which events this rule triggers. Bindings to groups/users are checked against the user of the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些绑定控制此规则触发的事件。 针对组/用户的绑定会检查与事件相关的用户。

trans-unit.source: If your authentik Instance is using a self-signed certificate, set this value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的 authentik 实例正在使用自签名证书，请设置此值。

trans-unit.source: If your authentik_host setting does not match the URL you want to login with, add this setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的 authentik_host 设置与您要登录时使用的网址不匹配，请添加此设置。

trans-unit.source: Selecting an integration enables the management of the outpost by authentik.
trans-unit.target: 选择集成使 authentik 能够管理前哨。

trans-unit.source: You can only select providers that match the type of the outpost.
trans-unit.target: 您只能选择与前哨类型匹配的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Outposts are deployments of authentik components to support different environments and protocols, like reverse proxies.
trans-unit.target: 前哨是对 authentik 组件的部署，用于支持不同的环境和协议，例如反向代理。

trans-unit.source: Warning: authentik Domain is not configured, authentication will not work.
trans-unit.target: 警告：未配置 authentik 域名，身份验证将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Detailed health (one instance per column, data is cached so may be out of date)
trans-unit.target: 详细健康状况（每列一个实例，数据经过缓存，因此可能会过时）

trans-unit.source: If enabled, use the local connection. Required Docker socket/Kubernetes Integration.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，请使用本地连接。需要 Docker Socket/Kubernetes 集成。

trans-unit.source: Can be in the format of 'unix://' when connecting to a local docker daemon, using 'ssh://' to connect via SSH, or 'https://:2376' when connecting to a remote system.
trans-unit.target: 连接到本地 Docker 守护进程时可以采用 'unix://' 格式，通过 SSH 连接时采用 'ssh://' 格式，或者在连接到远程系统时采用 'https://:2376' 格式。

trans-unit.source: CA which the endpoint's Certificate is verified against. Can be left empty for no validation.
trans-unit.target: 验证端点证书所依据的 CA。可以留空，表示不进行验证。
TLS 身份验证证书/SSH 密钥对

trans-unit.target: 匹配选定模型创建的事件。如果留空，则匹配所有模型。
基于代码的 MFA 支持

trans-unit.source: When enabled, code-based multi-factor authentication can be used by appending a semicolon and the TOTP code to the password. This should only be enabled if all users that will bind to this provider have a TOTP device configured, as otherwise a password may incorrectly be rejected if it contains a semicolon.
trans-unit.target: 启用时，可以通过在密码后添加分号和 TOTP 代码来使用基于代码的多因素身份验证。仅在所有绑定到此提供程序的用户都已配置 TOTP 设备的情况下才应该启用，否则密码可能会因为包含分号而被错误地拒绝。
